trans-unit.source: An abstract class for creating a custom activity with imperative behavior defined with the <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute*> method, which gives access to variable and argument resolution and extensions.
trans-unit.target: En abstrakt klass för att skapa en anpassad aktivitet med tvingande beteende som definierats med den <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute*>metod som ger tillgång till variabeln och argumentet upplösning och tillägg.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute*>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, creates an instance of the derived class.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en instans av den härledda klassen implementeras i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Inte implementerat.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*> instead.
trans-unit.target: Använd <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*>i stället.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata*>

trans-unit.source: Custom activity authors can provide validation logic in an activity's <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> override.
trans-unit.target: Anpassad aktivitet författarna kan ge verifiering logiken i en aktivitet <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>Åsidosätt.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A> are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Eventuella undantag utlöstes från <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>inte behandlas som verifieringsfel.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.CacheMetadata%2A>

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: Sådana undantag ska läcka ut från anropet till <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>och måste hanteras av anroparen.</xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Not implemented.
trans-unit.target: Inte implementerat.

trans-unit.source: Creates and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Skapar och verifierar en beskrivning av aktivitetens argument, variabler, underordnade aktiviteter och aktivitet delegater.

trans-unit.source: The workflow runtime uses the default implementation of CacheMetadata to ensure correct construction of a workflow as well as to manage runtime relationships and lifetime rules.
trans-unit.target: Arbetsflödets körtid använder standardimplementering av CacheMetadata för att se till att rätt konstruktionen av ett arbetsflöde samt att hantera runtime relationer och livslängd regler.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of CacheMetadata examines the public members of the activity type using the type’s <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Standardimplementering av CacheMetadata undersöker aktivitetstypen med typen <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor> public-medlemmar

trans-unit.source: These public members are of type <xref:System.Activities.Argument>, <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Variable>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Activity>](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), or <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.
trans-unit.target: Dessa offentliga medlemmar som är av typen <xref:System.Activities.Argument>, <xref:System.Activities.Variable>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Variable >](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), <xref:System.Activities.Activity>, [T:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable\<T:System.Activities.Activity >](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), eller <xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate>.</xref:System.Activities.ActivityDelegate> </xref:System.Activities.Activity> </xref:System.Activities.Variable> </xref:System.Activities.Argument>

trans-unit.source: You can override this method to customize the building of the activity’s run-time description and to provide custom validation logic.
trans-unit.target: Du kan åsidosätta den här metoden för att anpassa bygga aktivitetens körning beskrivning och tillhandahålla anpassad valideringslogik.

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions that are thrown from CacheMetadata are not treated as validation errors.
trans-unit.target: Eventuella undantag utlöstes från CacheMetadata behandlas inte som valideringsfel.

trans-unit.source: These exceptions will escape from the call to <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A> and must be handled by the caller.
trans-unit.target: Sådana undantag ska läcka ut från anropet till <xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>och måste hanteras av anroparen.</xref:System.Activities.Validation.ActivityValidationServices.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: Aktivitetens metadata som kapslar in aktivitetens argument, variabler, underordnade aktiviteter och aktivitet delegater.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, performs the execution of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Utför körningen av aktiviteten implementeras i en härledd klass.

trans-unit.source: The execution context under which the activity executes.
trans-unit.target: Körningskontexten under vilken aktiviteten körs.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Stöds inte.

trans-unit.source: Setting a value for this property returns a <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.
trans-unit.target: Ange ett värde för den här egenskapen returnerar <xref:System.NotSupportedException>.</xref:System.NotSupportedException>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity> does not allow defining the execution logic as an activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity>tillåter inte definierar körningslogik som en aktivitet.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Instead the execution logic must be defined in the <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: I stället körning logiken måste definieras i den <xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Activities.CodeActivity.Execute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar alltid <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar eller anger versionen implementeringen av aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: The implementation version of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Implementering version av aktiviteten.

trans-unit.source: Raises an event when creating a map for the dynamic update.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverar en händelse när du skapar en mappning för dynamisk uppdatering.

trans-unit.source: The metadata.
trans-unit.target: Metadata.

trans-unit.source: The original activity.
trans-unit.target: Den ursprungliga aktiviteten.
